title: Curvedashing New mechanic? Instant supersonic with no boost

media:group.media:title: Curvedashing New mechanic? Instant supersonic with no boost
media:group.media:description:
Today I am showcasing an unknown (or unused, I'm sure someone else knows it) mechanic that lets you save a seemingly impossible save and is very useful for gaining speed in many situations.

0:00 The impossible save
2:32 Curvedashing explained
3:47 General tips
6:00 Tips for higher speed and other curves
7:29 When to use curvedashes
8:02 How to do the impossible save
9:23 Another mechanic?
